name: CHERNOBYL HISTORY OF NUCLEAR DISASTER
description:
You are a young engineer at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. The fourth reactor test is about to begin.

Main features:
  • You must decide in which order to perform all the tasks in the control room. Perhaps you can avoid a catastrophe.
  • Later, you accept the "Liquidator" role. It is his duty to clean and remove effects of the disaster.
  • Extinguish the first fire.
  • Collect radioactive graphite chips.
  • Find a switch among the ruins and empty the tanks from water. Look out for the remains of the reactor.
  • And many other tasks performed by liquidators.

This game is a tribute to the heroism of Liqudators of the Chernobyl disaster.
